name: malia classic cowl
notes:
this cowl is just what it says it is - classic! a top ribbing adds a little extra visual appeal to the already beautiful combination of the 3rd loops stitches and the large bean stitches.

one really handy thing about this pattern is that it is very easily adaptable to any yarn weight. so if you're looking for a super quick project, choose a bulky or super bulky yarn (and appropriately-sized hook); or, if you're looking for something a little more delicate, choose a dk yarn or even smaller. there are notes within the pattern that will instruct you on how to adjust; just keep a ruler handy, and you'll be good!
